metadata.title: CVE-2019-15945 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
OpenSC before 0.20.0-rc1 has an out-of-bounds access of an ASN.1 Bitstringin decode_bit_string in libopensc/asn1.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15945` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.20.0-1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.20.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: opensc package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.20.0-1').
